price: 2. qui conduit vers la juste voie, et nous y avons cru. Nous n’attribuerons donc aucun associé à notre Seigneur !
arabic: يَهۡدِيٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشۡدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ وَلَن نُّشۡرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yahdī ilā al-rush'di faāmannā bihi walan nush'rika birabbinā aḥadan
